title: Looking to form a chill back 5's team
body:
Hey guys im looking to put together a team with the main goal to have fun.
the last season i bounced around high silver and low gold and looking for people around the same skill level. 
might try our hand at open ladder if others are keen

So leave your IGN and role or add me in game
IGN dalairus

replies.body:
ign: istezz
role: all but top

ign: Hi Im Kotome
role: Support or Top
